New Records: Maheesh Theekshana and Dilshan Madushanka registered Sri Lanka’s highest 10th wicket partnership in World Cup during NZ vs SL match
Key Match Events: Maheesh Theekshana and Dilshan Madushanka partnership
Pre-Game Insights: New Zealand won the toss and elected to bowl
Pitch conditions: square boundaries 67 metres and 60 metres, straight 73 metres; cloudy and humid with 80% chance of rain
Post-Match Reflections: New Zealand happy with the target but it took too long to get the final wicket
New Zealand in driver’s seat for semis spot after thumping win over Sri Lanka
Miscellaneous Highlights: Lockie Ferguson returns to the XI
Weather and pitch conditions affecting the match
Others: New Zealand playing XI: Devon Conway, Rachin Ravindra, Kane Williamson (c), Daryl Mitchell, Tom Latham (wk), Glenn Phillips, Mark Chapman, Mitchell Santner, Trent Boult, Lockie Ferguson, Kyle Jamieson

Sri Lanka playing XI: Pathum Nissanka, Kusal Perera, Kusal Mendis (wk) (c), Sadeera Samarawickrama, Charith Asalanka, Angelo Mathews, Dhananjaya de Silva, Maheesh Theekshana, Dushmantha Chameera, Kasun Rajitha, Dilshan Madushanka
